      • createGame

        org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<BaseResponse> createGame(GameType gameType,
                                                                 java.lang.String token,
                                                                 java.lang.Integer playerCount)
        This method is used to create a new game.
        Parameters:
        gameType - The type of game to create.
        token - The user's token used to authenticate.
        playerCount - The number of players in the game.
        Returns:
        A response entity with the game details
